oai_dc:dc.dc:title: French. Kentucky Equal Rights Association, December 15, 1916. 1 of 2.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Mrs. Joseph Alderson, Second Vice President, Kentucky Equal Rights Association, Middlesboro, KY, to Mrs. Lucy (sic.) Crozier French, Knoxville, TN. December 15, 1916. Page 1 of 2. Re: Mrs. French's letter in the Knoxville Journal &Tribune about Dr. Brighton(?). Lizzie Crozier French Papers.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Correspondence; Women's suffrage;
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Mrs. Joseph Alderson
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: C.M. McClung Historical Collection, Knox County Public Library
